description: This file defines the PlaybackActivity class which manages media playback using ExoPlayer within an Android application. It handles initialization, media item setup, and release of resources, integrating with Media3 UI components and passing data via Intents.

classes.name: PlaybackActivity
classes.description: Activity that manages media playback including initializing ExoPlayer, setting up the UI with PlayerView, handling lifecycle events to allocate and release resources, and creating intents for launching the activity with specific media items.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the PlayerView, sets it as the content view, and retrieves the ContentItem passed via intent.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Creates and prepares the ExoPlayer instance with the media item derived from ContentItem, starts playback.

methods.name: onStop
methods.description: Releases the ExoPlayer resources and detaches the PlayerView to prevent leaks.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events for DPAD navigation, defaults to superclass handling.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Static method to generate an Intent for starting PlaybackActivity with a specified ContentItem.
